meanings.definition: The branch of physiology that deals with the functions of the nervous system.
meanings.sent1: Studying neurophysiologies helps us understand how our brains work.
meanings.sent2: Researchers delve into neurophysiologies to uncover the secrets of the nervous system.
meanings.sent3: The neurophysiologies of the brain can be as fascinating as solving a puzzle.
meanings.sent4: Exploring neurophysiologies is like deciphering the intricate wiring of a complex machine.
meanings.sent5: Learning about neurophysiologies is like peering into the control center of our bodies.

meanings.definition: The study of the functions of the nervous system.
meanings.sent1: Understanding neurophysiologies is crucial for advancements in medical science.
meanings.sent2: Doctors rely on neurophysiologies to diagnose and treat neurological disorders.
meanings.sent3: Sometimes, learning about neurophysiologies feels like unraveling a mystery novel.
meanings.sent4: In a way, neurophysiologies are like the intricate pathways of a bustling city.
meanings.sent5: The complexity of neurophysiologies mirrors the complexity of the human mind.
